content.detailedDescription: I was walking along a road around the backside of a local college when i happened to look up at the sky and saw a brilliant light.  the size of the light itself was the same as the size of the moon, but it wasn't the moon because the moon was behind me. the light stayed the same size for a few seconds and then very slowly faded away.  i did see an ariliner in the vacinity but ruled the airliner out because airliners can't glow that brilliantly and that the light had no flashing red lights.  i also ruled out a helicopter for the same reasons.  i am pretty sure it wasn't a meteor because of the fact that the light was stationary.
content.summary: Brilliant light in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription: Four seperate occassions observing objects in sky stationary then moving and changing colors,sited over ocean. one other occassion whereby object was sited just above tree level at first i thought it was a star but was to low i ran to the house to get my wife she to observed it i observed it thrue my binoculars, i went back to the house then came back and it was gone.
content.summary: Object sited, changing colors stationary then moving.

content.detailedDescription:
This has been spotted on a regular basis by a number of people on a weekly basis , then today i have witnessed this myself with another person a medium to fast moving object with totally no sound, the lights are red , blue and yellow , most often spotted around atlantic country around 9pm  till midnight , today have witnessed it at 10:49-10:59 , yet again no sound , very clear night , moving north  by north west at a considerable speed , normal military flight patterns for the area do not match  they tend to head north then east . and are very low and very loud even at night this was not a military transporter .  

first witness has seen this many times on the way home from work , has mentioned it to other people , this is the first night 2 people have seen the same object and can confirm no sound 

object appears to be very large compared to a standard military transport at the same height would = 1.5 to 2 times the size .. other aircraft movement at higher altitudes can be seen , no intervention was seen . 

no media available as yet due to personal experience only lasted 5 mins , before it went below the forest line but could be seen thru the forest trees now and then 

will try and get gps cords soon
content.summary: Hovering circular lights then fast moving object.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on the loop in  stephenville heading south toward hwy 377, when i spotted an object to the south of the city with a row of four bright white lights spaced apart in a row. these lights blinked off, then four more lights appeared in the same configuration immediately to the left of the original lights . they blinked off ,then all eight lights came on .These were very bright. at that point i could see the whole configuration was moving in an easterly direction. then all of the lights disappeared. i would guess that the object could have been a mile long.   i was talking to a friend on the cell phone when he spotted the same object from a different vantage point in the city. about a month ago i spotted a different type of ufo kind of in the same area but looked totally different. this one looked like a bright neon orange ball then it replicated itself immediately into two spheres the same size as the original then it disappeared just as quickly as it appeared many people in the area have seen this one. the object i saw tonight really freaked me out as i could see the whole configuration moving as an object.This confirmed to me that it wasn"t an illusion.The way the lights popped on and off was really like science fiction, the craft appeared to be about 1000-2000 feet off the ground and was traveling at a moderate speed. was really hard to tell because of the size of the craft.
content.summary: Spotted south of stephenville,bright white lights spaced evenly,could have been a mile long.

content.detailedDescription:
On 11/18/08 at about 1900 hours, i was standing in the front yard of a residence on clifton street in stephenville texas.  i was standing with two other people.  one of the people pointed to an object in the night sky.  i looked towards the southwest and observed a circular shaped object that was displaying lights in a circular pattern.  the object appeared to be just outside the city limits towards the southwest of town.  it appeared to be  approximately 1000 feet in altitude.  

if you imagine a wall clock laying flat on a table.  the lights started lighting up at the 12 o'clock position and cycled counter clockwise to the 6 o'clock position.  the lights went out and then began on the opposite side at the 12 o'clock position and cycled clockwise to the 6 o'clock position.  the lights formed a perfect circular shape.  another person i was standing with said a light appeared on top of the craft prior to the lights forming in a circular pattern.  i am currently in the law enforcement field and have prior military experience.  the lights i observed did not resemble any type of aircraft or flare i have ever seen.
content.summary: I observed a circular shaped object in the night sky that displayed lights in a circular pattern.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were traveling north on lazy bend toward brock in sw parker co., right about 7 pm.  it was dark, i noticed two flashing white lights directly ahead, what caught my attention was the great distance apart they were and they were blinking one, then the other, then a pause. then one then the other. in a sequence. it appeared to be fairly low, about where a small plane would fly.  the distance between the lights was much too great to be any kind of plane.  it didn't appear to move at the time, i pointed it out to my daughter and she too commented on the size.  we pulled over to get a better look, it suddenly was moving to the west.  we tried to keep it in sight but it moved very quickly to the west and out of sight, probably within 15-20 seconds once it started moving.  the two lights stayed a steady distance apart and once it moved to the west, the lights were blinking in unison, two quick flashes then a pause.  they had to be part of the same object as they traveled at exactly the same rate at a steady distance apart.  i didn't see it long enough to be able to tell whether there was any type of structure, but the two lights were obviously connected by something.  there were many planes in the sky at the same time, this was definitely not a plane.
content.summary: Very large object, two lights blinking in unison very far apart moving over sw parker co.

content.detailedDescription: I dropped my fiance off at chilis on harlem and headed west on 151st street at 4-5pm in the evening. in the course of driving straight ahead i noticed these glowing lights in the west do incredible patterns and i couldnt believe what i was seeing.  i stopped in the orland park mall parking lot got out watched for a min while the objects continued west i decided after calling my mom and telling her extacticly that i want pictures no one is going to believe me.  i jumped in my car raced to domicks for a throw away camera got in bought it ran out and the objects were disappearing in the west and i drove as far west as i could till the street ended at the same time the objects disappeared.  the patterns were amazing.  if someone could contact me and let me know what i saw or if anyone else saw this i would like to know what it was or anything.  although im not sure exactly of the date but i maybe able to narrow it down because my daughter was not  born and my fiance was working still at chillis we were only together for 6-8 months so with some thought we maybe to narrow down to a month.  somebody contact me by email or whatever let me know what i saw it was broad day light out!!!
content.summary: I headed west from tinley and watched  these lights manuever 4-6 in ridiculous unexplainable patterns in the sky t=

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the country, no streetlights. i was at the end of our driveway away from the porch light taking the trash to the road. i noticed the triangle with lights on the corners and heard a faint jet engine far away, i saw 2 other lights i thought were airliners at a higher altitude. as i watched the triangle it was moving north, i thought it was making the noise. i cant guess the altitude but it was high,  about 35 degrees above the horizon. 

it continued north for about 30 seconds after i noticed it and then turned east, at that point the 2 "airliners" turned to follow it and i realised they were much closer than i thought and much smaller than the triangle. it seemed to be their engines i heard. i dont know if the triangle made noise or not, it seemed to be pretty far away.

it turned east and either the lights went out, or werent visible anymore i didnt see it again. the 2 jets (maybe military?) turned east to follow the triangle and continued east. they didnt change course as i went back to the house and finally couldnt see them for the trees around my house.
content.summary: Triangle followed by 2 jet aircraft

content.detailedDescription: At home in bed. i saw it out the window.In the southwestern sky.It was stationary but it faded in out.I was curious and i told my brother about it.It disappeared.
content.summary: Trapezoid shaped with white light in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down us hwy 377 2-3 miles north/northeast of dublin, texas looking to the south/southwest when i witnessed a long formation of blinking brights white lights which appeared to be directly over the top of us hwy 377. another area of the same pattern looked like it was directly over the city of dublin. these lights stretched over a mile to 2 miles radius in perfect formation. after about 10 minutes these lights ceased quickly. at the very end of this event i noticed 2 jets moving towards the areas where the lights had been. there has to be more witness'es to this event out there because the lights where over the city & over us hwy 377 'very populated areas of erath county.
content.summary: Strange flashing lights near & over dublin, texas

content.detailedDescription: My children and i (2 children) where out looking at the two bright stars in the night sky south of selma texas, i looked up after setting up the telescope and observed what at first i took as a satellite in low orbit, it was reflective because it got brighter, then it started to zig zag back and forth for about 40 seconds. then it went straight again and faded out to nothing. when this was happening i pulled my daughter over to see it, she saw it just as it was zig zagging and said it was silver. it was heading east south east at the time and we observed it at about a 60 degree angle. i am a trained observer from the military so the behavior was not any aircraft or satellite that i know of.
content.summary: Looked like a satellite but then started zig zagging.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my room getting changed. only my hallway light was on, all of a sudden a light came through my window and my girlfriend who was talking stopped in mid word and stood perfectly still, i couldnt even feel air in the room it was as if i was standing in a picture. the only noise was a high pitched tone. i ran over to my girlfriend after staring at her and the light coming into the room, when i touched her the light receded back through the window, and everything was normal, she finished what she was saying but she was shocked that i had appeared in front of her. i drug her to the window and we seen something sitting in the sky not even 200 feet outside the window toward the sky. its zipped off. there was even someone outside talking on her cell phone across the parking lot, but my girlfriend and i both seen it. everyone else acts normal like nothing happened. i am so not crazy, i have been in the army for 10 years, i am thirty and work in advertising, there was no explanation for what happened.
content.summary: Light came through my window and time stopped exept for me.

content.detailedDescription: Ok. i have been watching for around 3wks a ufo in the western sky. it arrives always at sunset is disappears about 7 to 8 central time. i have a friend about an hr away that said she has been watching it for over a yr. it looks like it could be venus but its not. it looks close to venus but this slowly moves and sometimes flashes. i have been watching the stars and ufos now for over 12yrs. seen one in 98 up close about 30yards out. i will stand in a place where i can look at this light and pick out things around me so i can tell how much its moving and if its what i think it is. i know what an airplane looks like and this isnt it especially when it is hovering in place for hrs like it does. just thought for once i would tell somebody outside of my friends. david
content.summary: Light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Investigator beverly trout is submitting this sighting to cms. the investigation was done in 2003 by beverly trout, pam brackenbury, and clair canfield, and submitted to mufon headquarters at that time, but apparently did not get listed on cms.

the reporting witness says he and a male friend were fishing at a farm pond not far from the tiny town of belknap, iowa, and about 10 miles nw of drakesville, iowa, at 7:30 p.M. on 10/7/2003, when they saw an estimated 12 to 20 white lights moving east to west, seemingly at high altitude, passing through the visual area of the constellation of virgo.  lights were first observed at about 45 degrees up from the eastern horizon and last seen at about 15 degrees up from the western horizon.  witnesses observed that the lights were switching positions very fast as they simultaneously moved forward, the cluster of lights all the while staying in the same area of their grouping.  witness perceived them as white spots.  that is, the lights did not seem to gleam or glisten; they were not shiny.

size of lights seemed 3-4 times bigger than satellites they've observed in the night sky, and the lights all appeared to be the same size.

witness saw the moon; it was at 20-25 degrees up from eastern horizon, but that it had nothing to do with the sighting.  sunset on 10/7/03 was at 6:44 p.M., about 45 minutes before the sighting. 

weather per iowa state climatologist:
temperature - 62 degrees f
dewpoint - 55 degrees
visibility - 10 miles
wind - s at 8 mph

it should be noted that mufon received two (2) other reports for the night of october 7, 2003, one from the fairfield, iowa, area for the same 7:30 p.M. time, and the same general description of a group of lights, and another sighting reported as approximately an 8:00 p.M. time frame of a group of lights at much lower altitude in the urbandale (des moines) area.  none of the witnesses know the other witnesses.
content.summary: Cluster of lights moving fast & changing positions as moved forward

content.detailedDescription: My 10 year old daughter took this picture near bearcat stadium in aledo texas on 11-07-08. she said that she watched this bright object slowly moving around for about 10 minutes or so. then it slowly faded away.
content.summary: Bright ball of light.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and you have to go outside to have a cigarette so i did. i was standing at the door of our office which is connected to the convent and a man waved to me to come over to him at the school.  i walked about 40 feet and he asked me to look up into the sky.  i did and at first i thought it was clouds but then i thought they were birds in some type of formation.  but these objects were*- big and beautiful and pure white.  there were absolutely no distinct marks at all.  they were moving extremely fast and they appeared really far away.  we watched them for about 30 seconds and then they just disappeared.  the man and i looked at each other and i said to him "that was really weird."  he shoot his head and we parted ways.  i went back to work and never gave it another thought.  until i read an article today in the bucks county courier times.  i could not believe someone else saw the same thing.  that's why i am contacting you now.  i don't remeber the exact day or month, i know it was april or early may because i stopped smoking on mother's day and haven't smoked since.  also the day was beautiful with a clear blue sky and long small clouds.  i remember the clouds because at first i thought the objects in the sky were clouds because they were so white.  i would have never thought ufo's but now that someone else saw what we did it definitely was something i would like explained.  it was the strangest and weirdest thing i ever witnessed for all of 30 or 40 seconds.  i remember it like it was yesterday and could still point out where they were in the sky.  it was like they were flying with a mission and heading west.
content.summary: Smoking a cigarette outside near school and a gentleman called me over to school and asked me to look up in the sky.  at  first i thought it might be birds flying in some type of formation.  but they were pure white.  they were also moving extremely fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Not that it probably makes any difference now, but here it goes:  i was about 18 yrs. old at the time living in southern california in 1977.  it was trash night, and the subdivision we lived in was not very brightly lit, so on a clear night, you could see the stars very clearly in the sky, as it was this night.  as i was hauling the first trash can to the curb, i noticed in the sky a v-shaped pattern of lights all moving in my direction very slowly about 2 miles from me.  i remember a patteen of about 7-9 lights in a flat, wide, v-shaped boomerang configuration, that were orange-red in hue, but did not throw a beam like the headlights of a car.  instead, they were subdued, like dim reddish flourescent lights.  the lights retained a fixed distance of separation relative to each other.  the group appeared to be about 2000-3000 feet off the ground and were slowly approaching my direction.  after staring at this for a minute or so, it was now about a mile away.

originally, i dismissed the issue as a group of helicopters flying in formation at night, on the way from, or back to camp pendleton marine base in oceanside, ca.  i walked back to the house to get another trash can.

with the second trash can to the curb now, the formation was directly over my head, still at the same elevation, and the lights were still moving in the same direction in absolute perfect silence.  not a single sound.  it was then that i realized these were not planes, helicopters, or balloons because now i could just barely see the outline of the large v-shaped craft that the lights appeared to be attached to.  it was just a silhouette against the backdrop of normal stars in the sky.  it was the lack of visible stars that i could make out its outline as it moved across the sky.  no other lights, markings, openings, protrusions, or anything else on the underside of this v-shaped craft.  it size was about 500-700 feet across and 200-300 feet front to back as i could judge given its altitude.

i stood there for a second then immediately ran to the house in a panic, suspecting it was a ufo, and hoping this thing did not see me underneath it and come after me.  a few minutes later, i looked outside again to see that it had passed overhead and was still there, but heading away already a mile or so away.

again, i asserted to myself that this must be some military craft, and soon forgot about it.

fast forward to 2008, i now see the exact ufo being shown on some of the discovery and history channel shows recently.  again, this story likely has little significance now at this late date other than a timeline for how long this type of craft has been spotted.
content.summary: Seen exact ufo in 1977 as shown on tv shows now.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving away from weatherly high school when i saw a dime sized, cloud like structure in the sky.  as i watched it disappeared, kind of like it blew away. it was only there a few seconds. the sky was totally clear at the time.
content.summary: A round cloud like structure

content.detailedDescription:
Two bright lights have been in the sky above my home for 2 months. they are sun lit and disappear as it gets darker. looking through my basic orion 4" telesope, they appeared cylyndrical in shape. my wife observed the lower one manuver towards upper one, then move laterally across my house, and disappear at a great speed(silent) i saw the same the next evening. it appeared back at it's original position under the upper one.
  they have been here a month and have heard any news about them from our local new's etc.
  i'm hoping that some one in the phoenix area has looked at them as well. or maybe someone else should look at them. i live in maricopa, south of phoenix, so someone has had to report them at some point. could mufon shed any light on this sighting?
                 kevin p. moran (going nuts trying to figure these two objects out. thanks for any help!
content.summary: Originally cylinderical then sphere shaped.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back porch of my house (on the second floor) when my room mate and i saw an extremely bright yellow-white flickering light about 30 degrees up from the horizon and toward the south-west of my house. this lasted about 5 seconds and then flickered out until a star-like light remained and traveled toward the west. i thought it was an aircraft turning on and off it's landing lights but it seemed way too bright for that. after about 3 minutes the exact same thing happened but the light seemed even more bright causing a halo effect in my eyes. the second time was in a completely different place in the sky and was not moving. my room mate and i became extremely excited and called all of our friends out to look at the light. this light appeared 3 more times and seemed to be progressively dimmer each time. each time was in a different spot in the sky. there was a total of 5 events. i am a former airman in the military and can say with total certainty that this was not any aircraft type event. the light was way too bright. i also had a feeling that this was a lot further away than it appeared, leading me to believe that it was in space rather than in our atmosphere. i really would like to speak with a mufon rep and i would also like to know if there were any other witnesses to this event. i have seen things in the sky before that i can not explain but this was such a profound event that i can not just "brush it off."
content.summary: Extremely bright repeating flickering light. 5 seperate occasions.

content.detailedDescription: I just pushed out the trash bins at its curve side for tomorrow pickup and saw a 4-amber lights in the shape of a boomrang that it flew silently over head in the direction of north to south towards the disneyland, anaheim about 8:55pm. the event happened so fast that i've been stunned to see it passing by and not enough time to take a picture even though my digital camera were inside and on my desk. my guess its altitude is about the same as of a small cessna-typed plane.
content.summary: 4 amber lights in the shape of boomerang

content.detailedDescription: Walking down 20th ave towards irving and at the corner i looked up at the sky and saw a formation of  fireballs that looked like stars. then i saw them move and start to form in different shapes. i ran into the corner store and told the guy to come out. three other people sitting outside saw this also. then two kids in a jeep pulled up and said hey are those ufos. i was excited and wanted to get my camera. the fireballs changed formations a few times and then started to disappear in 3s and 4s. not fast but as if the fireballs were slowly becoming dimmer until there was nothing.
content.summary: Fireballs changing formations then slowly becoming dimmer until no longer there. incredible.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok my cousin has already reported this i know but she started talking about it the other day and told me i should also report it. i haven't thought much about it since it happend tho. i was driving and she was riding with me to lufkin,i live about 30min west of lufkin and only come to lufkin about 1 time a week.They are doing road construction on 59 by walmart so we went down this side road to keep from running in to traffic at 5pm. we were going down a naborhood street that runs next to hwy 59 going south, i wouldn't have noticed it becasue it was over the tree line and i was watching the road. my cousin noticed it so we pulled over along with a few other cars...The only reaction i remeber having was wow thats real cool. we watched it for a few min. maby 3min and then it moved off tword our left so we turned down the next road to the left to try to see it again and it was gone. i can't estimate on the size of it or how hi it was. it was not a blimp tho. there was nothing patruding out from it like wings or campartments, it was very smooth and sleek and bright white.Almost as if it could have been matalic with white light reflecting off of it.
it was a very clear day. blue sky 5pm still very daylight out. it kinda stayed still for a few min then begain to move slowely,but as soon as we turned down the other road wich was probly a block up from where we were it was gone.Never seen it again and haven't thought alot about it since then either.So i hope this report helps in someway
thank you
content.summary: Big bright blimp thing in the sky near hwy 59 in lufkin.

content.detailedDescription: I   was in front of my house talking to the state trooper that was    directing traffic  to the annual italian celebration in verplanc ny this celebration is always on the third weekend of july it runs only 4 days and only between the hours of 7:oopm to about mid night  the days of the feast are thursday friday saturday and sunday with lots of fireworks about midnight it was about 8;30 to 8;45 pm it was dark as i walked to my house no more than 20 feet away from where i wasi just happen to look in the direction of the feast due north from where i was when a long string of lights got my attention i ran inside grabbed my binos 7x50 and ran outside thelights were still coming but very slow as they came right over my head i heard a faint humming sound and the yelling what the hell is it? as i try to look for some structure all i could see was a dark object that was very big moved very slow had a strange humm many big bright  white lights that were blinking many small non blinking lights and a very unusual way of turning the huge object was very low and turned without banking which i find strange it made a very sharp  u turn right over my head and slowly headed back north north east since there was this rummor going around about ultralights at first i thought they were ultralights however after watching the ufo hunters on tv and seing those lights and hearing that strange sound  again i believe that what i saw that night was not a group of ultralights  this object must have been 6oo feet wide flew very low and also flew very slow very queit and trailing this object was a strange small blinking red light which had me confused since i could not tell if this light was part of this object or a separate  craft my then 10 year old son joshua remembers the trooper complaining about always having a camera in their cars except when you need one today i m convinced that what i saw was the hudson valley ufo  i m an amateur astronomer and do not believe for one second that we are alone,  thank you for listening to my story.
content.summary: Large dark object  boomerang.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work going eastbound on kettleman rd. when in front of me i saw a red light flashing with a white light next to it. i figure  it was a slow moving plane. i would guess it was about 2000 feet up northeast from where i was driving, moving southwest towards south lodi at about 200 mph per hour. as i was watching  a green light came on  that was not blinking on the other side of the object. as it got closer to my position i could see it was a black triangle shape object.  i follow the craft for about 10 minutes until i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Large black triangle object.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst living and working in the netherlands me and three friends were off to a friends house in the near by town of gennep. we were cycling through a forested area (two bikes, one person riding the other on the back) when i noticed what looked like a star moving quite quickly across the sky. i first thought it was a satellite but it stopped suddenly and then changed direction. i pointed it out to my friends and we stopped cycling and watched it for a couple of minutes. as we watched we noticed, what had first looked like two stars, move in the same fashion as the other one. fast movement with sudden changes in direction. the three lights seemed to move around each other. as we watched and wondered what they were the noise of a commercial aeroplane became apparent and we watched as the planes lights (the flashing lights on its wings) came into view. one of the lights then left the other two and circled around the plane and as the plane moved out of sight the light returned to the other two. at this point my friends and i were starting to get a bit excited, as you can imagine it's not everyday you see something like this. after about 35-40 min we decided to head off toward town, we then herd another noise. the noise was so loud we ducked and covered our ears as 5 military jets shot over our heads at a staggeringly low altitude heading toward the three lights. as they drew closer and started to gain altitude the three light seem to join together and streaked across the sky and upward leaving the military jets as if they were standing still. unfortunately it was about nine years ago we all saw this so i'm not sure of the date, all i know it was in the autumn of 1999.
content.summary: Lights in sky moving around each other. one light moved away and approached an aircraft. lights joined together and left as military aircraft approached.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from new orleans heading west toward kenner on i-10.Me and my wife noticed this light in the sky.It looked to be over lake pontchatrain.Well the light traveled from east to west then it just vanished.As i continued to look in the sky i seen jets flying toward this object.It had a yellowish tent and diddnt look like it a shape that i could see.But i have never seen a object vanish like that.Im sorry about spelling
content.summary: Seen a ufo fly across the sky then disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second time this craft has came over my house.  its has bright lights and moves forwards and sideways at once.  when it approached my house the lights shut off immediately to show a triangle shape with blue and red lights on each point.  

the first time i saw this the monday before but around 5:45am and that time it disappeared quickly and made no sounds.  

this time it went over the house slowly and had a very low rumbling sound that did not sound like any plane i have heard and about 5 minutes later after the object was no longer in sight several helicopters followed in the same path.
content.summary: Triangle with large lights that shut off when approached house and had 3 lights to show triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to my parent���s house in the foothills of the bighorns about fifteen miles south of sheridan, wyoming on the way to story, wyoming at around 9:30pm sunday, novemeber 16th 2008, when, about midway on my drive, i saw a large and stable light in the sky. its color was neutral and did not have visible wing-tip or tail strobes. as i observed the light over the course of several minutes, it became apparent that it was stationary (or nearly stationary, perhaps descending slightly) and that i was quickly approaching its position. the rate of my approach indicated that the light was low and near. these observations all ruled out most forms of airplane. the craft had to be vtol and relatively small.

about eleven miles out of town there is a ���tank farm��� ��� a filling station for fuel trucks. this is at the junction of mead creek road and highway 87. i found the light to be centered directly above the tank farm and very low. i did not rule out the possibility it could be a helicopter and i wondered whether the tank farm could have a helipad to receive some sort of business by helicopter.

i slowed to approximately 30-40mph, muted my stereo and rolled down the window to listen for the beats of a helicopter blade. i could hear no blade nor any sort of engine roar. simultaneous traffic on the highway, consisting of two cars within the half-mile behind me, did not seem to slow to observe the light, but i obviously could not see what was going on inside them.

depending on the size of the object, it seemed to be, judging by my position and the stature of the gasoline tanks, only about 100-200 feet off the ground. clearly, this is only explicable if the craft were a small helicopter and was coming in for a landing on site.

at the time, i continued driving. by the time i reached bird farm road, about another mile down highway 87, my inner fox mulder had clearly won and i whipped the car around and sped back to try and get a definite confirmation that the craft was a helicopter by either watching it land or listening (at a complete stop) for the sound of blade clips.

i reached the location in less than a minute and passed it twice. no traffic was around, so i passed it both times at 10mph, radio off and windows down. there was no trace of the light or any craft anywhere in the sky or on the ground. there was no visible helicopter at the site and absolutely nothing was in the air. the cloud ceiling was very high and could not have concealed a helicopter that had just taken off. similarly, no stars were visible to camouflage the craft if it had taken off and achieved a very high altitude somehow in that short period of time.

when i passed the tank farm the next morning (11/17/08) on the way to work, i observed that there is no place on the site that i could see designed for a small helicopter to land. 

the physical description of the light is difficult. no features were distinguishable. if there were multiple lights on the craft, they bled into one, singular neutral-colored upside-down teardrop shape (which may have been due to refraction and not indicative of the shape of the actual craft). i could not distinguish wings or a tail. no blades or propellers were visible or audible. it did not exhibit any lateral movement. it seemed to have descended as i neared the position, but this movement was very subtle and smooth. it was definitely only a few hundred feet off the ground at most when i passed it, though i am pretty sure it was much higher than that at the moment i first spotted it.

i had noted the time when i left town and again during and after the sighting. there was no ���missing time.��� the entire sighting lasted only a matter of minutes. 

i had also seen something similar in a nearby location when i was in high school, but later wrote it off as a (strangely low) helicopter. several ranchers in the area may have private helicopters, but the absolute noiselessness of the craft, its lack of tail or strobes, and the speed of its disappearance make that solution difficult.
content.summary: Light observed at low altitude near to highway 87 above petroleum farm

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof of our ranch house 17 miles outside of wikieup arizona, wathching these objects in the southern sky.  they were very large and we initially thought they were flares, but they would remain stationary,,, drop down behind a ridge approximately 20 miles away and come back to their previous altitude.  they had smaller red lights circling them and those smaller lights would go inside the larger orange lights then come back out and go down to the ground.  this went on for about 4 hours.  my mother father and some of our friends saw them.  a few weeks later my brother in law and his friend and i saw two of them on a mountain top closer to the ranch house. about 4 miles away and we went to investigate them.  they were on a mountain called groom peak which is south of highway 93 by the burro creek bridge.  they also were spherical in shape and orange.  they also released smaller red lights that were traveling down the side of the mountain and going into the canyons around the base of the mountain,,, they then would go back up to the orange lights and go into them.  we drove up to an abandoned ranch house that was about 2 foot ball field away from the lights and they were gone in an instant, no noise,  sometimes during the day we could here a deep rumbling in the distance toward the ridge where we saw the first 6 lights.
content.summary: 6 orange spheres with smaller red lights orbiting them
